alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 30 at 8:17PM PST until December 03 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Sections of central and eastern Lake County. This includes sections of highway 31 near Summer Lake, Silver Lake and higher terrain in the Warners. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Travel will be difficult for higher profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be accumulating at times, especially over the higher terrain. Winds will be strongest Friday afternoon and Saturday afternoon. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
